mapper.insert: insert into duty_info (duty_id, duty_name, duty_description) values (#{dutyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dutyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dutyDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select duty_id, duty_name, duty_description from duty_info
SELECT di.duty_id, di.duty_name, di.duty_description, din.dept_name FROM duty_info di LEFT JOIN link_duty_dept ldd ON di.duty_id = ldd.duty_id LEFT JOIN dept_info din ON din.dept_id = ldd.dept_id
SELECT di.duty_id AS dutyId, di.duty_name AS dutyName FROM duty_info di LEFT JOIN link_duty_dept ldd ON di.duty_id = ldd.duty_id WHERE ldd.dept_id = #{deptId} AND ldd.emp_id IS NULL
